text: Maike Becker (born 12 April 1962) is a German handball player who played for the West German national team. She was born in Esens, Lower Saxony. She represented West Germany at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, where the West German team placed fourth. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Lower Saxony Category:German female handball players Category:Olympic handball players of West Germany Category:Handball players at the 1984 Summer Olympics
title: Maike Becker
